mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gift_config_category( id, category_name, gift_price, merchant_qualification, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, del_flag, remarks, status, merchant_code ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{categoryName}, #{giftPrice}, #{merchantQualification}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks}, #{status}, #{merchantCode} )
